column1: # language = yrk (yrk-tun, Tundra Nenets, Samoyedic, Uralic)

# description = "Route description 1": the data were collected via a modified version of the original HCRC map task (https://groups.inf.ed.ac.uk/maptask) implemented for one speaker (the speaker was the Instruction Giver, and I as the fieldworker was the Instruction Follower); the map was simplified and the labelled features (number of them) were made more familiar to cultural circumstances. The text was recorded in 2017 in Moscow.
# text_en = I stand behind the fence.
# text_en = There are two reindeer there.
# text = Сидя тэхэ' няд маряд' нимня маряд' тяха' санэйв'.
# text_en = I jump over the fence away from the two reindeer.
# text_en = After I jump I go on.
# text = Нерни' няна пирця харадм' манэ"ӈадм'.
# text_en = I notice a tall tower in front of me.
# text_en = Its roof is peaked like a tent.
# text = Сидя сидеранда си, нёнда си таня.
# text_en = It has two windows and a door.
# text_en = Its door has stairs (“its door is bestaired”).
# text_en = I go up the stairs.
# text_en = I enter through the door.
# text = Маха саблюй харад' мюмня ирт' хаядм'.
# text_en = I go through the tower with the sharp roof.
# text_en = I walk out the other door.
# text = Нё' сим' нэв, танця' сер' ха"амыв'.
# text_en = I open the door and go down the stairs.
# text_en = I walk and turn to the right.
# text = Маханякубта' мимани' сер' яха' таркавна ӈадимядм'.
# text_en = While I am walking on the right side, I arrive to the fork of the river.
# text = Няби яха' таркам' ӈохолё мадав.
# text_en = I swim across one fork of the river.
# text_en = I climb after the end of the fork of the river.
# text = Тарканда пыям' мада"махадани' ӈани' ӈохолё нэкалӈав, яхам' мадав.
# text_en = After I walk across the headland I keep swimming, I cross the river.
# text = Тадтикахад ӈани' ялъява" нерни' няна пям' манэ"ӈадм'.
# text_en = While I am walking I see a tree in front of me.
# text = Пям' маханяӈы хэвувнанда яля' пырдари' сюртев.
# text_en = I walk around the tree on the right against the sun.
# text = Тамна тяха" ялъяв', ядвани' сер' пулм' манэ"ӈадм'.
# text_en = I keep walking, while I am walking, I see a bridge.
# text = Пул' сер' яхам' няби' ня' мадав.
# text_en = I cross the river on the bridge to the other side.
# text = Тадтикахад сятанякубта' мэхэя тамна тяха' ялъяв'.
# text_en = Afterwards I keep walking turning to the left hand side.
# text = Тадтикахад маряд' нё сивня тарпыв'.
# text_en = Then, I go out the gate of the fence.
